General.Name: Apogee Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Apogee Minerals Ltd. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral property in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, and polymetallic deposits. It has an option to acquire an 80% interest in the Pine Channel gold property covering an area of approximately 6,502 hectares located in northern Saskatchewan. Apogee Minerals Ltd. was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 777 Dunsmuir Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1K4

1.Name: Mr. Timothy Cyril Fernback CPA, CMA, CPA, M.B.A., MBA
